name: Fire Ant Picnic FREE - Burger Smasher Game
name_original: Fire Ant Picnic FREE - Burger Smasher Game
description:
This is no Picnic – especially when Fire Ants have taken over! Tap the screen and watch them jump from hamburger to hamburger. Gather up slices of pickles and tomatoes. Use your skills to help the Fire Ant capture all the condiments and reach each achievement.

EXCITING FUN AND ITS FREE TO DOWNLOAD!!!

FEATURES:
- Tap addictive game play
- Numerous levels
- Several Picnic Reals
- Endless Run Mode. How far can you go?

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Fire Ant Picnic FREE’ Now!!!
